description: Calls and grabs an executable then runs it with the given parameters.

customAttributes.name: callbackURL
customAttributes.description: The URL to call back to grab the executable.

customAttributes.name: parameters
customAttributes.description: The parameters when executing the executable. In PowerShell array format without any brackets like the default.

compilationAttributes.name: saveAs
compilationAttributes.description: Name of the powershell file to be created, can be full path or just a name
